casebody.data:
Thomas R. A. Hall, et al., Respondents v. Julius Lipman, Appellant. Decided June 23, 1887. Appeal from a judgment for the plaintiffs entered on a decision of the judge at trial term, on a trial without a jury. Thomas C. Enever, for respondents. Julius Lipman, for appellant.

Before Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed on the opinion of the court below, with costs and disbursements.
